mapper.insert: INSERT INTO instant_user ( u_code, u_lname, u_fname, u_birth, u_edate, u_phone, u_email, u_passport, u_agreement) VALUES ( iu_seq.nextval,#{u_lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR },#{u_fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR },#{u_birth,jdbcType=DATE },#{u_edate,jdbcType=DATE }, #{u_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR },#{u_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR },#{u_passport,jdbcType=VARCHAR },#{u_agreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR } )
